data_table.description: Metacarpel, Original Cohort Exams 10, 11, Offspring Cohort Exams 4, 5, 6

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: UNIQUE PARTICIPANT ID

variable.name: wd_M402
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF WIDTH AT 40% OF DIAPHYSIS LENGTH, MM [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: wd_MC402
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF MEDULLARY CAVITY WIDTH AT 40%, MM [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: wd_M502
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF WIDTH AT 50% OF DIAPHYSIS LENGTH, MM [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: wd_MC502
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF MEDULLARY CAVITY WIDTH AT 50%, MM [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: wd_M602
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF WIDTH AT 60% OF DIAPHYSIS LENGTH, MM [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: wd_MC602
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF MEDULLARY CAVITY WIDTH AT 60%, MM [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: Length2
variable.description: LENGTH OF THE METACARPAL BONE, MM [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: MCT2
variable.description: METACARPAL CORTICAL THICKNESS, MM=(D_OUTER)-(D_ENDO) [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: MCI2
variable.description: METACARPAL CORTICAL INDEX, % = ((D_OUTER)-(D_ENDO))/(D_OUTER) 100% [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: MZ2
variable.description: METACARPAL SECTION MODULUS, MM3 = P (1/2(D_OUTER) 4 - 1/2(D_ENDO) 4) / (D_OUTER) [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: MSI2
variable.description: METACARPAL STRENGTH INDEX = MZ / LENGTH [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: CRT_A2
variable.description: CORTICAL AREA, % = [((D_OUTER) 2-(D_ENDO) 2)/(D_OUTER) 2] 100% [M2-METACARPAL 2]

variable.name: wd_M403
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF WIDTH AT 40% OF DIAPHYSIS LENGTH, MM [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: wd_MC403
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF MEDULLARY CAVITY WIDTH AT 40%, MM [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: wd_M503
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF WIDTH AT 50% OF DIAPHYSIS LENGTH, MM [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: wd_MC503
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF MEDULLARY CAVITY WIDTH AT 50%, MM [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: wd_M603
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF WIDTH AT 60% OF DIAPHYSIS LENGTH, MM [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: wd_MC603
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF MEDULLARY CAVITY WIDTH AT 60%, MM [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: Length3
variable.description: LENGTH OF THE METACARPAL BONE, MM [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: MCT3
variable.description: METACARPAL CORTICAL THICKNESS, MM=(D_OUTER)-(D_ENDO) [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: MCI3
variable.description: METACARPAL CORTICAL INDEX, % = ((D_OUTER)-(D_ENDO))/(D_OUTER) 100% [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: MZ3
variable.description: METACARPAL SECTION MODULUS, MM3 = P (1/2(D_OUTER) 4 - 1/2(D_ENDO) 4)/ (D_OUTER) [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: MSI3
variable.description: METACARPAL STRENGTH INDEX = MZ / LENGTH [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: CRT_A3
variable.description: CORTICAL AREA, % = [((D_OUTER) 2-(D_ENDO) 2)/(D_OUTER) 2] 100% [M3-METACARPAL 3]

variable.name: wd_M404
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF WIDTH AT 40% OF DIAPHYSIS LENGTH, MM [M4-METACARPAL 4]

variable.name: wd_MC404
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF MEDULLARY CAVITY WIDTH AT 40%, MM [M4-METACARPAL 4]

variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF WIDTH AT 50% OF DIAPHYSIS LENGTH, MM [M4-METACARPAL 4]

variable.name: wd_MC504
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF MEDULLARY CAVITY WIDTH AT 50%, MM [M4-METACARPAL 4]

variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF WIDTH AT 60% OF DIAPHYSIS LENGTH, MM [M4-METACARPAL 4]

variable.name: wd_MC604
variable.description: DIRECT MEASURE OF MEDULLARY CAVITY WIDTH AT 60%, MM [M4-METACARPAL 4]

variable.description: LENGTH OF THE METACARPAL BONE, MM [M4-METACARPAL 4]

variable.name: MCT4
variable.description: METACARPAL CORTICAL THICKNESS, MM=(D_OUTER)-(D_ENDO) [M4-METACARPAL 4]

variable.description: METACARPAL CORTICAL INDEX, % = ((D_OUTER)-(D_ENDO))/(D_OUTER) 100% [M4-METACARPAL 4]

variable.name: exam
variable.description: EXAM INDICATOR WHEN XRAY WAS OBTAINED

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER
